file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-12-03-04 - APU SIDE MOUNTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU SIDE MOUNTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the APU side mounts. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 49-12-03-000-801-A APU SIDE MOUNTS - REMOVAL ALL 49-12-03-400-801-A APU SIDE MOUNTS - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-12-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-12-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU SIDE MOUNTS - REMOVAL A. General (1) The two mounts attaches laterally in the APU lower part. These points are the support structure for installation, transport and storage of the APU. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-10-01-000-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 49-00-00/200) OR (AMM MPP 49-02-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-12-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the APU ( AMM TASK 49-10-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Cut the lockwires. (2) Remove the bolts (4), washer (3), and angle support (2) of each side mount. (3) Remove the side mounts. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-12-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL APU Side Mounts - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 313 B LOCKWIRE 1 BOLT DET. A WASHER ANGLE SUPPORT C 1 BOLT SIDE MOUNT BRACKET 1. SIDE MOUNT BRACKET 2. ANGLE SUPPORT LOCKWIRE DET. B 3. WASHER WASHER 3. WASHER ANGLE SUPPORT 1 4. BOLT 2. ANGLE SUPPORT 1 4. BOLT LOCKWIRE DET. C LOCKWIRE 1 TORQUE VALUE: 6.2 TO 7.9 N.m (55 TO 70 lb.in) 145AMM490019.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-12-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-12-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU SIDE MOUNTS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to install the APU side mounts. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-10-01-400-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 Aircraft tail cone D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque Wrench To tighten the attaching screws available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS9226-03 Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the side mounts in the correct position. (2) Install the bolts (4) with washer (3) and angle support (2). Refer to Figure 401 for torque values. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-12-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Lockwire bolts (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU ( AMM TASK 49-10-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. (4) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-12-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
